_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: VPS
author: Matheusn.biolowons@gmail.com
description:
üíé Egg: VPS
‚öôÔ∏è Version: 2.1
‚ùì What is it: A VPS. This egg uses Proot (FakeRoot) which tricks the system into thinking you are a superuser. Installing a Pterodactyl inside another Pterodactyl has never been so real!

‚ö†Ô∏è Attention: 
     ‚Ä¢ Using Root in Docker is not recommended in any way. I am not responsible for any damage/action you may cause with this.
     ‚Ä¢ A minimum of 1GB of space is required.
     ‚Ä¢ Debian/Ubuntu distributions may take more than 15 minutes to complete the installation.
     ‚Ä¢ Ubuntu distributions are not working at the moment.

üêû Bugs fixed/changelogs:
     ‚Ä¢ (1.0) Release.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Detects if the Egg is updated or not.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Ability to change Linux Distribution: (Debian, Ubuntu, Alpine).
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Updated arguments, the system is now less restricted.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Ability to change arguments.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Fixed the Shutdown command, it is no longer necessary to kill the server.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Fixed Initialization, now the Panel knows the Server is on.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Installation script was rebuilt.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.1) Serious script bugs fixed.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.1) Ability to switch root between: PRoot(Default), PRoot-rs, FakechRoot + FakeRoot.
     ‚Ä¢ (2.1) Clean Installation Added.

üìù New Variables: 
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Use your own arguments?
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Your Arguments
     ‚Ä¢ (2.0) Linux Distribution
     ‚Ä¢ (2.1) Change Root
     ‚Ä¢ (2.1) Clean Installation?

üëë Author: Ashu
üëÄ Check for updates: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p /mnt/server > /dev/null
cd /mnt/server
mkdir libraries > /dev/null
echo "2.1" > libraries/version
echo "true" > libraries/version_system

variables.name: Use your own arguments?
variables.description: Enable the use of your own arguments? Do not enable this if you don't know what you are doing.

variables.name: Your Arguments
variables.description:
CAUTION, only change this if you know what you are doing. If you want to add your own arguments, see the PRoot Wiki: https://github.com/proot-me/proot/blob/master/doc/proot/manual.rst
The default arguments are: -0 -r . -b /dev -b /proc -b /sys -w / -b .

variables.name: Linux Distribution
variables.description: Select which Linux Distribution you want the script to download. Currently, these distributions are available: Debian, Ubuntu, Alpine.

variables.name: Change Root
variables.description: Change the root system. Currently, there are these 3 types: PRoot(Default), PRoot-rs, FakechRoot + FakeRoot

variables.name: Clean Installation?
variables.description: With a clean installation, the following packages will not be installed: sudo wget hwloc htop nano neofetch python3 ngrok gotty curl
